long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get Clean URL is the first tool in my "Tiny Tools" series - a collection of safe and simple productivity tools I created for personal use, and now I am sharing with you.

This straightforward tool neatly formats long, unwieldy URLs into an easy to share format with one click. It removes tracking parameters to enhance privacy without breaking links.

ðŸ“Œ Enhanced privacy - removes tracking parameters

This tool works with most Chromium-based browsers including Chrome and Edge.
